title: Uproar Over Trump's Migrant Separation Policy Reaches a Fevered Pitch | Becca Heller
itunes:title: Uproar Over Trump's Migrant Separation Policy Reaches a Fevered Pitch | Becca Heller
description:
Fox News pundits defend Trump's family separation policy, Roy Wood Jr. meets with an unlikely mayor in Montana, and Becca Heller discusses her efforts to assist refugees.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
